title: Molly Mae faces backlash
brief_description: Influencer and former Love Island contestant, Molly- Mae Hague, faces backlash after a clip of her talking about her work ethic went viral. During a podcast interview she implied that poverty is linked to laziness, claiming that “everyone has the same 24 hours”.
